sentences.english: To reduce purchase cost, the PLA had shortchanged on training and maintenance support elements.

sentences.english: He explained that he was the commander of a small unit, with around 100 men.
sentences.chinese: 他自称是一个小分队的指挥官，手下大约有100人。

sentences.english: The convoy of Chinese peacekeeping transportation detachment are traveling across the vast forest in west Africa.

sentences.english: The application of mass flowmeters in team measurement is introduced.

sentences.english: These team sponsors are called project champions.

sentences.english: A detachment of Marines was left behind to help in the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 海军陆战队的一支分队被留下来帮助消毁这些物质。

sentences.english: In addition, capture teams were sometimes sent out to seize UN soldiers for interrogation.
sentences.chinese: 另外，有时派出捕俘分队抓捕联军士兵进行审问。
